Nissan may bring ultra-compact EV production in-house from 2028, sources sayJapan's Nissan Motor may bring production of its ultra-compact electric vehicles in-house, five people familiar with the matter said, emboldened by the success of its Sakura model currently built by junior partner Mitsubishi Motors .
